The level advance oxidation protein product ( AOPP ) , thiol , malondialdehyde ( MDA ) , nitric oxide ( NO ) 8-hydroxydeoxyguanosine ( 8-OHdG ) level triglyceride ( TG ) , total cholesterol ( TC ) , high density lipoprotein ( HDL-K ) , low density lipoprotein ( LDL-K ) , Apolipoprotein A1 ( ApoA1 ) Apolipoprotein B100 ( ApoB100 ) measure gonadotrophin therapy .
